questions.question: How worthwhile was the lab for you on a scale of 1 to 5?
options: 1 - Not Worthwhile
5 - Very Worthwhile

questions.question: Were there any questions that were particularly difficult for you? If so, why?
Is there anything in this lab that you would like to change?
How difficult was the lab for you on a scale of 1 to 5?
options: 1 - Too Easy
3 - Just right!
5 - Too Hard

questions.question: What best describes yourself?
options: Secondary School Student or Younger
Undergraduate Student
Graduate Student
Working Professional
Other

questions.question: If you responded "Other" to the previous question, what is that other option?
What best describes your previous computer science experience?
options: I have no computer science experience at all
I have taken one or two introductory courses
I self-learned as much as I could
I earned a degree in computer science
I have multiple years of industry experience

questions.question: What best describes your previous statistics experience?
options: I have no statistics experience at all
I have taken one or two introductory courses
I self-learned as much as I could
I earned a degree in statistics
I have multiple years of industry experience
